mapper.insert: INSERT INTO commnty_tb ( title, contents, writng_de, member_seq) VALUES ( #{title}, #{contents}, now(), #{member_seq} )
mapper.select: SELECT a1.commnty_seq, a1.title, a1.name, a1.writng_de, a1.hits_co, ifnull(a2.cnt, 0) as cnt FROM (SELECT a.commnty_seq, a.title, b.name, a.writng_de, a.hits_co FROM commnty_tb a, (SELECT member_seq, case join_route when 'phyctogram' then name when 'facebook' then facebook_name when 'kakao' then kakao_nickname end as name FROM member_tb ) b where a.member_seq = b.member_seq) a1 LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT commnty_seq, count(*) as cnt FROM comment_tb GROUP BY commnty_seq ) a2 ON a1.commnty_seq = a2.commnty_seq ORDER BY a1.writng_de DESC LIMIT #{pageCntFirstIndex}, 10

SELECT a1.commnty_seq, a1.title, a1.name, a1.writng_de, a1.hits_co, ifnull(a2.cnt, 0) as cnt FROM (SELECT a.commnty_seq, a.title, b.name, a.writng_de, a.hits_co FROM commnty_tb a, (SELECT member_seq, case join_route when 'phyctogram' then name when 'facebook' then facebook_name when 'kakao' then kakao_nickname end as name FROM member_tb ) b where a.member_seq = b.member_seq) a1 LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT commnty_seq, count(*) as cnt FROM comment_tb GROUP BY commnty_seq ) a2 ON a1.commnty_seq = a2.commnty_seq ORDER BY a1.hits_co DESC LIMIT #{pageCntFirstIndex}, 10
mapper.update: UPDATE commnty_tb SET hits_co = hits_co+1 WHERE commnty_seq = #{commnty_seq}
